casebody.data:
MUTTER
v.
BALL. No. 150P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2016. Jason Lee Mutter, Spruce Pine, for Mutter, Jason Lee. Mike Ball, Superintendant, for Ball, Michael (Superintendent). Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for Ball, Michael (Superintendent). Todd Williams, District Attorney. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of April 2016 by Petitioner to Proceed In Forma Pauperis: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of April 2016." ERVIN, J. recused.
